challenges.name: ASIS Primes
challenges.desc: ASIS Primes is a cryptography challenge requiring primes with printable, meaningful bytes; can you generate such primes effectively?

challenges.name: Alice Sig Slip
challenges.desc: I messed up and a function wiped some of Alice's data. Can you help me restore it before she notices?

challenges.name: Asemoon
challenges.desc: No entry until Asemoon’s token breaks! Can you reverse its secrets?

challenges.name: Goliver II
challenges.desc: Goliver_II is an innovative elliptic curve cryptosystem designed to present unique challenges for the new era of cryptographic security.

challenges.name: Hoshi
challenges.desc: Hoshi: a cryptic puzzle demanding brilliance, where only the sharpest minds unravel its celestial secrets.

challenges.name: Ikkyu San
challenges.desc: Ikkyu San, a sage child, developed a unique crypto-system that helps young CTF players identify and choose talented individuals.

challenges.name: Interpol
challenges.desc: Only brute force won't crack Interpol! Its massive polynomial guards the flag fiercely.

challenges.name: Juliax
challenges.desc: Juliax’s partial RSA key is like a half-baked cookie crumbling, but still oddly satisfying to crack!

challenges.name: Leptocole
challenges.desc: Leptocole’s equation is so last-year, yet here you are, still solving for ‘U’ like a nerd!

challenges.name: Lowdown
challenges.desc: These 0s and 1s have the digital handwriting of a drunk Ph.D., trace their signature, sign your own name, and leak their crayon-scrawled Lowdown.

challenges.name: Mancity
challenges.desc: Decipher Mancity by exploiting RSA modulus secrets, bit by bit, relation by relation.

challenges.name: Matemith
challenges.desc: Solving Matemith’s polynomial equations is easier than pronouncing ‘Matemith’, but that’s not saying much!

challenges.name: Mechanic
challenges.desc: Mechanic’s ‘post-quantum’ lock is so easy, even Schrödinger’s cat could crack it, alive and dead.

challenges.name: Mechanic II
challenges.desc: Mechanic II cranks PQC to hilarious levels, bring a quantum wrench and a PhD in pain.

challenges.name: Mitram
challenges.desc: Solving Mitram’s equations? Time to row reduce your expectations... and your sanity.

challenges.name: Multi shooti
challenges.desc: The Multi-shooti code left clues out in the open. Spot them, steal the key, grab the flag, and prove it’s not so tough after all.

challenges.name: Nahan
challenges.desc: Nahan hides better than a cat at bath time; do the right thing at the right moment, and it pops out with the flag!

challenges.name: Pearls
challenges.desc: Unlock Pearls by hunting primes, each one brings you closer to the hidden flag!

challenges.name: Phoney
challenges.desc: Phoney laughs! Until you unpick its multi-prime RSA and random message lock.

challenges.name: Silky
challenges.desc: Silky’s ‘noisy’ equations are like static on a radio—annoying, but solvable if you tune just right.

challenges.name: SingleRow
challenges.desc: SingleRow’s crypto is one line of defense, turns out it's also one line of nope! ;)

challenges.name: Snails
challenges.desc: Breaking Snails’ sigs? Even a decrypted flag moves at glacial pace!

challenges.name: Sobata
challenges.desc: Master Sobata by dissecting ECC secrets, then tame its walk function’s hidden path.

challenges.name: Sobata II
challenges.desc: Sobata_II is a hardened variant of Sobata, optimized for secure operations in large finite fields with enhanced resistance to attacks.

challenges.name: Toffee
challenges.desc: Sticky situation: Toffee’s crypto seems sweet, until you’re stuck chewing on its unsolvable core.

challenges.name: Vainrat
challenges.desc: Precision is key, Vainrat escapes sluggish calculators effortlessly.

challenges.name: Vinad
challenges.desc: Vinad's ‘random’ keys are as unpredictable as a cat. Poke its weak spots, steal the flag—chaos included!
